description:
•	Most of the time we are spending time for searching or finding or researching the information from the search engines. 
•	You may know only few search engines like Google, Yahoo, Bing .., etc but those are general search engines. 
•	General search engines are for searching the general topics. They are not designed for doing research for special categories like business or shopping or etc.
•	I f you fell bore with regular search engines then this app for you.
•	This app contains more than 150 search engines information.
•	The search engines information is classified in terms of categories.
•	So you can find very useful information very easily.
•	There are 18 categories are defined in this app. Categories like Business, Multimedia, News, Kids.., etc.
•	And also you can search the search engines.
•	This app will allow you to maintaining Favorite search engines. 
•	This app is suits for all whom using internet, developers, students etc.,
